text:
Now that 💊 #chloroquine / #cloroquina 💊 entering mainstream for #COVID19 I have seen some people refer to it an an #antiinflammatory

As *quite a bit* of data shows it works at both 'moderate' & 'severe,'  I'm more convinced its #immunomodulatory properties 👇are super relevant https://t.co/batW5OL6Fg
